pkg.name: section-alert
pkg.title: Section alert
pkg.description: Section alerts are non-disruptive notifications that provide information and messages about a state change in a section of a page.

scope.title: Section alert
scope.description: Section alerts are non-disruptive notifications that provide information and messages about a state change in a section of a page.

relatedComponents.name: global-alert
relatedComponents.title: Global alert
relatedComponents.description: Global alerts display prominent service or system wide messages at the top of the screen.

relatedComponents.name: page-alert
relatedComponents.title: Page alert
relatedComponents.description: Page alerts are colour-coded, non-disruptive notifications that provide Success, Error, Warning or Information messages at relevant times during the user journey. They should not be confused with Callouts.
